text: Vasyl Malyk (; born 23 November 1968 Drohobych, Ukrainian SSR) is a former Soviet and Ukrainian footballer and Ukrainian football coach. == References == ==External links== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:People from Drohobych Category:Soviet footballers Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:FC Chortkiv players Category:FC Halychyna Drohobych players Category:FC Yenisey Krasnoyarsk players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:FC Halychyna Drohobych managers Category:FC Skala Stryi (2004) managers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Kalush managers Category:FC Nyva Ternopil players
title: Vasyl Malyk
